translation.en: [music playing from Mother] ♪ Moon river, wider than a mile ♪
translation.it: Moon River, più largo di un miglio

translation.en: -♪ Hold me close and hold me fast ♪ -[baby continues crying]
-♪ Rest your head close to my heart ♪ -[crying]
translation.it: Poggia la testa sul mio cuore

translation.en: ♪ Don't you mind what they say ♪
♪ Let those eyes sparkle and shine ♪
♪ Never a tear, baby of mine ♪
-♪ From your head to your toes ♪ -♪ Baby mine ♪
translation.it: - Dalla testa alla punta dei piedi - Bimbo mio
Sei un amore, il cielo lo sa
Sei un amore, il cielo lo sa Bimbo mio

translation.en: ♪ You are so precious to me ♪
[Daughter] Why aren't there any more children, Mother?
[Daughter] I don't want to be a human.
[Daughter] Then why did you only make one?
translation.it: E perché ne hai fatto solo uno?

translation.en: My brothers and sisters are in those?
translation.it: I miei fratelli sono dentro quei cosi?

translation.en: [Mother] Would you like to meet them?
They're small now but, one day,
translation.it: Ora sono piccoli, ma un giorno,

translation.en: they'll be as big as you.
Do you think I'll have a brother or a sister?
translation.it: Avrò un fratellino o una sorellina?

translation.en: That would make me happy too.
Why couldn't we be born together?
translation.it: Perché non siamo nati tutti insieme?

translation.en: Do you think you'll be ready soon?
And then we can be a family?
How long's it been like that?
[Mother] Imagine a doctor has five patients,
translation.it: Immagina un medico con cinque pazienti.

translation.en: all in need of different organ transplants,
translation.it: Ognuno ha bisogno di un trapianto,

translation.en: but no compatible organs are available.
translation.it: ma non ci sono organi compatibili.

translation.en: One day, a sixth patient enters the doctor's office
translation.it: Un giorno, arriva un sesto paziente

translation.en: The new patient is curable, but also an organ match for the five other patients.
translation.it: Il nuovo paziente è curabile, ma è anche compatibile con gli altri.

translation.en: If the doctor simply delays treatment, the new patient will die,
translation.it: Ritardando le cure, il nuovo paziente morirebbe,

translation.en: but their organs could be used to save the other five patients.
translation.it: ma i suoi organi salverebbero gli altri cinque.

translation.en: If the doctor treats the new patient,
one life will be saved, but five others will be lost.
translation.it: il medico salverebbe una vita, ma ne perderebbe cinque.

translation.en: What is the doctor's best course of action?
We can select a different text.
However, your birthday is rapidly approaching and it would be a shame
translation.it: Certo, il tuo compleanno si avvicina e sarebbe un peccato

translation.en: if your scores failed to meet the projections from last year's examination.
translation.it: non vederti raggiungere il punteggio fissato l'anno scorso.

translation.en: -But you set the pace, Daughter. -Bentham's fine.
translation.it: - Ma fai tu, Figlia. - Bentham lo so.

translation.en: that a person is morally obligated
to minimize the pain to the greatest number possible.
translation.it: di minimizzare il dolore a più persone possibili.

translation.en: Now, consider that you are the doctor
translation.it: Ora immagina di essere tu il medico,

translation.en: and also the only organ match for your patients.
translation.it: ma anche l'unico compatibile per i trapianti.

translation.en: What then is the right choice?
I mean, Comte says I should be willing to suffer harm for the benefit of others.
translation.it: Secondo Comte, dovrei essere disposta a sacrificarmi per il bene altrui.

translation.en: Well, do I know these five patients?
might be giving my life for people who are murderers or thieves...
translation.it: potrei dare la vita per salvare un criminale.

translation.en: who end up harming more people due to my sacrifice.
translation.it: Potrei ferire altre persone col mio sacrificio.

translation.en: You don't feel that every human has intrinsic value
translation.it: Non credi che ogni umano abbia un valore intrinseco

translation.en: and an equal right to life and happiness?
translation.it: e diritto alla vita e alla felicità?

translation.en: I did last month, when you were teaching Kant.
translation.it: Lo credevo, quando mi spiegavi Kant.

translation.en: I didn't mean to alarm you about your exam.
The fact is it's more a test of my competence than yours.
translation.it: Misura le mie competenze, più che le tue.

translation.en: We can talk about that the next time you come on.
-Okay. Thanks for being here. -Yeah. I appreciate it.
-Thank you very much. -Steve Martin. Thank you.
[Daughter] Come on, come on, come on.
It was crawling around near the airlock.
Do you think it could be from outside?
But a risk we can't take.
You said nothing could survive out there.
Maybe the surface is safe now.
If it survived beyond these walls, that doesn't mean it's not a carrier.
translation.it: Pur essendo sopravvissuto qui, può essere un portatore.

translation.en: Mother, wait. Shouldn't we at least check?
Don't you think there could be a possibility that--
translation.it: Non può esserci la possibilità che...
Ma i miei dati sono chiari.

translation.en: Surface contamination levels remain hazardous to you
translation.it: Il livello di contagio all'esterno resta un pericolo per te

translation.en: and to all the unborns who will one day call this their home.
translation.it: e per i nascituri che un giorno abiteranno questo luogo.

translation.en: You had better take a shower.
[man on tablet] They travel with relatives or a few other families.
translation.it: Si spostano in famiglia, o insieme ad altri nuclei.

translation.en: Part wolf, part dog, these are no pets.
translation.it: In parte lupi, in parte cani. Non sono animali da compagnia.

translation.en: But without them, the Eskimos would not manage--
translation.it: Ma senza di essi, gli Eschimesi non potrebbero...

translation.en: [Mother] I don't want you coming near the airlock until I can confirm the area is uncontaminated.
translation.it: Sta' lontano dalla camera stagna, finché l'area non è decontaminata.

translation.en: Where are your pajamas from last night?
translation.it: Dov'è il pigiama che portavi ieri sera?

translation.en: I was beginning to think you forgot where the laundry was, Daughter.
translation.it: Temevo avessi dimenticato dov'è la lavanderia.

translation.en: That was an attempt at humor.
I had to dispose of your others, but I know they were your favorite.
translation.it: Ho dovuto disfarmi dell'altro. So che era il tuo preferito.

translation.en: [Mother] Would you like me to heat it more?
You know you can talk to me, Daughter, about anything.
translation.it: Puoi parlare con me di qualsiasi cosa, lo sai.

translation.en: I can make you something else.
How will you know if you don't go outside?
translation.it: Come puoi saperlo, se non esci?

translation.en: Doing so could make me a hazard to you.
translation.it: Se uscissi, sarei un pericolo per te.

translation.en: -No, but-- -I want you to be happy, Daughter.
-I am. I just think-- -Have you ever known me to be mistaken?
translation.it: - Lo sono, ma... - Mi hai mai vista sbagliare?

translation.en: You hear me? I'm here alone!
I need you to put on that suit.
I can't let you in if you don't.
I'm sorry, but that's the only way.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, ma è l'unico modo.

translation.en: [woman] Look, I won't make it out there.
Just let me tend to this.
But you need to keep out of sight.
I'll be back as soon as I can.
I only opened it for a second.
Did you think that suit would keep you safe? I didn't go outside.
translation.it: - La tuta non ti protegge. - Non sono uscita.

translation.en: That does not excuse your disregard for my authority
translation.it: Hai mostrato noncuranza della mia autorità

translation.en: or for the safety of the others in this facility.
Come, Daughter. I hope you show better discretion than this on your exam.
translation.it: Vieni, Figlia. Spero mostrerai più giudizio all'esame.

translation.en: Since you don't seem to want to sleep, I see no reason to delay.
translation.it: Dato che sei già sveglia, tanto vale avvantaggiarci.

translation.en: I suggest you shower off and head straight to class.
translation.it: Fai una doccia e vai dritto in aula.

translation.en: It's going to be a long day.
You have 60 minutes to complete the first portion of your exam.
translation.it: Hai 60 minuti per finire la prima parte di esame.

translation.en: If you're finished before I return, you can read.
translation.it: Se finisci prima del mio ritorno, leggi.

translation.en: I have lab work to complete and I must see to the airlock.
translation.it: In laboratorio e poi a controllare la camera stagna.

translation.en: I will have, but I need you to come with me.
translation.it: Dopo. Ora devi venire con me.

translation.en: Who put that in your head?
[Daughter] Will you be okay until I get back?
I'm going to get your medicine and I'll try and speak to Mother.
translation.it: Ti porto i medicinali e provo a parlare con Madre.

translation.en: It was in my bag. I need it now.
You're safe with us. It's fine.
-She can help you. I just-- -Like its friends outside?
translation.it: - Può aiutarti. - Come gli altri fuori?

translation.en: I'm not leaving until get it.
I'll sit when I'm clear of here.
She can't. Not in her condition.
translation.it: Non può. Non in queste condizioni.

translation.en: You should have informed me of this.
I was afraid you'd turn her away.
We need to take her to the infirmary.
It would be best if you go now, Daughter.
translation.it: Ora è meglio se vai, Figlia.

translation.en: how far was it from here?
[Mother] Your wound is most likely infected.
Without penicillin, any other measures will be useless.
translation.it: Senza penicillina, le altre misure saranno vane.

translation.en: Every second you don't trust me,
I know you're frightened, but you have no need to be.
translation.it: So che hai paura, ma non devi averne.

translation.en: If there are others, they could be in danger.
translation.it: Gli altri potrebbero essere in pericolo.

translation.en: What have you told my daughter?
Do you see the way she's looking at me?
translation.it: Vedi il modo in cui mi guarda?

translation.en: And you wonder why I've guarded her from certain facts.
translation.it: Ti chiederai perché la protegga da certi fatti.

translation.en: my primary directive is to care for humanity.
translation.it: la mia priorità è accudire l'umanità.

translation.en: If I wanted you dead, all I'd have to do is leave.
translation.it: Se ti volessi morta, mi basterebbe uscire.

translation.en: If you won't let me help you, at least help yourself.
translation.it: Se non vuoi aiuto da me, almeno aiutati da sola.

translation.en: I trust you know what you're doing.
I cannot force you to take it,
-Aren't you going to help her? -I tried.
translation.it: - Non la aiuti? - Ci ho provato.

translation.en: We can't leave her like that.
-You're bleeding. -Did you know there were people out there?
translation.it: - Sanguini. - Sapevi che c'era qualcuno fuori?

translation.en: This facility was designed by humans as a fail-safe,
translation.it: Gli umani hanno progettato questo centro

translation.en: programmed to activate in case of their extinction.
translation.it: perché si attivasse in caso di estinzione.

translation.en: To give humanity a second chance.
One that began with you, Daughter.
And all your data? The toxicity levels?
translation.it: E i tuoi dati? I livelli di tossicità?

translation.en: I had hoped to tell you myself.
I told you it was dangerous outside.
translation.it: Ti ho detto che è pericoloso fuori.

translation.en: If you'd feared the same danger in our home,
translation.it: Se tu avessi temuto quel pericolo qui,

translation.en: how could I have raised you?
I hope you see that I'm governed by different parameters than her assailants.
translation.it: Devi capire che ho parametri diversi dai suoi aggressori.

translation.en: Have I ever done you harm?
translation.it: Ti ho mai fatto del male?

translation.en: It was the only way, Daughter.
Perhaps our guest can answer that.
But until she sees I'm not her enemy, we cannot allow her to roam the premises.
translation.it: Ma finché mi vede come il nemico, non potrà uscire di lì.

translation.en: A few centimeters to the right and she would have destroyed my CPU.
translation.it: Qualche centimetro a destra e mi avrebbe distrutto la CPU.

translation.en: Hopefully she'll recognize that this is the safest place for her.
translation.it: Spero vedrà questo come un luogo sicuro per lei.

translation.en: Did she mention any other survivors?
If they're out there, they will be found.
translation.it: Se ce ne sono, li troveranno.
Se non li troviamo prima noi.

translation.en: We can take them in, Daughter.

translation.it: Ma non senza il suo aiuto.

translation.en: Pray for us sinners during this time of need.
translation.it: Prega per noi peccatori nell'ora del bisogno.

translation.en: Did you draw them from memory?
It tell you to go through my stuff?
translation.it: Ti ha chiesto di frugarmi in borsa?

translation.en: -I didn't mean to-- -I think you did.
translation.it: - Io non volevo... - Secondo me, sì.

translation.en: I think you meant for all of this.
Maybe you're not so bad off here.
translation.it: Forse non stai così male qui.

translation.en: Mother's not what you think. She's taken care of me my whole life.
translation.it: Madre non è come credi. Si è sempre presa cura di me.

translation.en: You haven't seen what they've done.

translation.it: Li ho visti bruciare neonati vivi.

translation.en: It's just a matter of time.
I shouldn't have hid her from you.
I never would have let her in if I thought she'd hurt you.
translation.it: Non l'avrei accolta, sapendo che t'avrebbe ferita.

translation.en: If you leave to find her family--
You know where they are? I'm just saying.
Are you sure you'd make it back?
Is that what's keeping you up?
It could be dangerous for you, if you get caught by other droids.
translation.it: È pericoloso. Gli altri droidi potrebbero catturarti.

translation.en: Or would they think you're one of them?
translation.it: O ti crederebbero una di loro?

translation.en: Have you always lived here, Mother?
I don't remember any other place.
Not knowing where you came from.
But I can see how it might bother you.
Has our guest been any more receptive?
and your blood pressure is dropping by the second.
Clearly you waited too long to take it.
Your sepsis will only worsen if you don't allow me to treat you.
translation.it: La sepsi peggiorerà, se non mi permetti di curarti.

translation.en: Your blood is infected with bacteria from your wound.
translation.it: I batteri della ferita sono in circolo.

translation.en: Soon you will go into shock.
see what its medicine's done to me?
translation.it: Vedi cosa fa la sua medicina?

translation.en: -I gave you the means to prevent this... -Ah!
translation.it: Ti ho dato i mezzi per guarire,

translation.en: but it seems you've left a bullet and soiled clothing fibers lodged in your hip.
translation.it: ma hai lasciato dentro il proiettile e fibre tessili sporche.

translation.en: Such a procedure would require anesthesia.
translation.it: È un intervento da fare in anestesia.

translation.en: Perhaps, once your organs begin failing, you'll reconsider.
translation.it: Al primo organo in insufficienza, ci ripenserai.

translation.en: That dozer's not coming near me.
[Mother] Tell me what you see, Daughter.
[Daughter] The bullet and its missile fragments
are lodged between the acetabulum and the femoral head.
[Daughter] A major portion of the bullet lies 23 millimeters posterior
translation.it: Il grosso del proiettile è 23 millimetri dietro

translation.en: to the femoral nerve and the femoral artery.
It doesn't look like I'll be able to obtain adequate grip with forceps.
translation.it: Non c'è spazio sufficiente per estrarlo con la pinza.

translation.en: -Once she's asleep, I'd-- -[woman] I'm not going under.
[Mother] Technically, it's possible, but an unnecessary risk.
translation.it: Tecnicamente, è possibile, ma è un rischio superfluo.

translation.en: Do you have an approach, Daughter?
[Daughter] I need to clean the wound.
What the hell is that for?
I have to drill this into the bullet in order to pull it out.
translation.it: Devo trapanare il proiettile per estrarlo.

translation.en: But there's less risk to neighboring structures.
translation.it: Ma rischiamo meno danni ad altre strutture.

translation.en: You rest. I'll go clean up the blood.
[Johnny Carson] Would you welcome, Whoopi Goldberg!
[Johnny Carson] I'm so glad you wore the good stuff.
translation.it: Ti sei vestita come piace a te.

translation.en: [Whoopi Goldberg] I have to give Mr. Blackwell something to talk about.
[Johnny Carson] Yeah. Do you believe his stuff?
He comes out, Mr. Blackwell, the dress designer,
who comes out every year with the ten worst-dressed women or something.
translation.it: Ogni anno stila la classifica delle peggio vestite.

translation.en: Have you seen the show before?
You did right by me last night.
translation.it: Ti sei comportata bene con me.

translation.en: I just... did what anyone would.
translation.it: Ho fatto ciò che avrebbe fatto chiunque.

translation.en: Can I show you something else?
You can trust us, you know.
we have enough food and supplies.
Listen, if I tell you something, can you keep it between us?
translation.it: Se ti racconto una cosa, rimane tra noi?

translation.en: I was on a night run...
bringing food back to the camp.
-Me and a couple of others. -What camp?
translation.it: - Io e altri due. - Quale campo?

translation.en: I lived most my life there.
Jacob and I got turned around.
translation.it: Io e Jacob ci siamo persi.

translation.en: We figured we'd wait it out.
It had hardly been an hour when the dozers found us hiding in the field.
translation.it: Dopo un'ora, quelle cose ci hanno trovati nei campi.

translation.en: He led them away from me.
That's how I made it to your door.
translation.it: È così che sono arrivata qui.

translation.en: His parents found me as a baby. Orphaned.
translation.it: I suoi genitori mi trovarono da piccola. Orfana.

translation.en: He's about your age, in fact.
Maybe you could talk to them.

translation.it: Il tuo posto non è qui.

translation.en: -I don't think it's... -[door beeps and slides open]
I was just saying it's probably too early to put weight on her leg.
translation.it: Le dicevo che è presto per mettere peso sulla gamba.

translation.en: She's right. You'll need to wait several days.
translation.it: Ha ragione. Devi aspettare qualche giorno.

translation.en: I'll just, um, stay and read in case--
translation.it: Resto qui a leggere, in caso...

translation.en: You have other matters to attend to.
I'm sorry you feel that way.
It seems our guest has not been entirely truthful with us.
translation.it: Pare che l'ospite non sia stata onesta fino in fondo.

translation.en: The bullet you extracted matches the caliber she fired into my chest.
translation.it: Il proiettile estratto ha uguale calibro di quello che ha sparato a me.

translation.en: she hasn't said much at all.
Until I can get more answers I don't want you two alone in the infirmary.
translation.it: Finché non ne vengo a capo, non rimanere da sola con lei.

translation.en: -Um, I... -Whoever shot her... may have had good reason, Daughter.
translation.it: Se le hanno sparato, ci sarà un buon motivo.

translation.en: How does that make you feel?
[Mother] We'll review areas for improvement tomorrow.
translation.it: Domani studieremo le aree di miglioramento.

translation.en: What do I do with this?
Daughter, would you please choose the next member of our family?
translation.it: Figlia, vuoi scegliere il nuovo membro della nostra famiglia?

translation.en: Your brother is the first of many, Daughter.
translation.it: Tuo fratello è il primo di tanti, Figlia.

translation.en: [Daughter] What happened to you out there?
Or was he made up too?
Mother matched the bullet to your gun.
translation.it: Il proiettile è della tua arma, dice Madre.

translation.en: You compare the bullets with your own eyes?

translation.it: I sentimenti che provi sono naturali.

translation.en: how long would it take to get to the mines?
We'd have to wait for my brother.
I can't leave them with Mother.
No, you're... you're right. I just...
We could come back with people from the mines.
If she catches on, we're no good to anyone,
translation.it: Se dovesse fermarci, non salveremmo nessuno,

translation.en: Once Mother hands over the baby for the night...
translation.it: Quando lo lascerà per la notte,

translation.en: we can leave while she recharges.
Then come back for the others.

translation.it: Non trovo il latte in polvere.

translation.en: Um, I thought it might be nice to spend some time with him.
If it's all right with you.
[Mother] Each bottle must contain a ratio of 60 milliliters of sanitized water
translation.it: Ogni dose deve essere composta da 60 millilitri di acqua sterile

translation.en: It's vitally important that you measure precisely.
translation.it: È di vitale importanza misurare con precisione.

translation.en: I detect an increase in anxiety.
You have nothing to be nervous about.
You're going to make a great sister.
Now be sure to shake it until the powder is fully dissolved.
translation.it: Ora scuoti, finché la polvere non si scioglie.

translation.en: The refrigerator will preserve the formula while we make our other preparations.
translation.it: Lo conserveremo in frigorifero, mentre faremo gli altri preparati.
- Per quanto si conserva? - Solo 24 ore.

translation.en: Only 24 hours, so don't mix too much at once.
translation.it: - Per quanto si conserva? - Solo 24 ore. Non prepararne troppo.

translation.en: I wouldn't leave it out long.
[Mother] You're very fortunate to be alive.
Things could have gone differently for you.
They still can if you're not careful.
translation.it: Può ancora, se non stai attenta.

translation.en: [Mother] How many of them are still alive?
While you lie there enjoying sanctuary,
And yet it's into your hopeless mines that you wish to take my daughter.
translation.it: Eppure è nelle tue sporche miniere che vuoi portare mia figlia.

translation.en: [woman on recording] If that thing catches on, we're no good to anyone,
translation.it: Se dovesse fermarci, non salveremmo nessuno,

translation.en: [Daughter on recording] I'm not leaving without him.
Once Mother hands over the baby for the night,
translation.it: Quando lo lascerà per la notte,

translation.en: we can leave while she recharges.
Then come back for the others.
[Mother] What kind of Mother would I be
if I allowed you to lead my child into a life as miserable as your own?
translation.it: se ti lasciassi trascinare mia figlia nella tua vita misera?

translation.en: It seems she has formed an affection toward you
that has blinded her to your true nature.
translation.it: le occulta la tua vera natura.

translation.en: I will not tolerate your negative influence undermining my work
translation.it: Non lascerò che la tua influenza mini la mia opera,

translation.en: [garbled] I will not tolerate... influence... undermining...
How do we get out of here?
-What... what about my brother? -We'll come back.
The only people who can help your brother are out there.
translation.it: Ci aiuteranno gli altri di fuori.

translation.en: [Mother] Your loyalty is lost on her, Daughter.
translation.it: Sprechi la tua lealtà con lei, Figlia.

translation.en: This woman doesn't care about any future but her own.
translation.it: A questa donna, interessa solo il suo di futuro.

translation.en: Your family needs you here, Daughter.
translation.it: Devi restare qui per la tua famiglia.

translation.en: We haven't got time for this.
Come on, we've got to find cover.
Come on! We've got to go. Now!
[Daughter] Do you think it was looking for us?
If it was, it would have found us.
translation.it: Se così fosse, ci avrebbero trovate.

translation.en: What are you doing? Get down.
When I say, "Get down," get down.
translation.it: Ti ho detto di stare giù!

translation.en: [woman] They showed up about six months ago.
All I know is, before that...
you could hardly breathe the air.
[Daughter] How many do you think will go back with us?
[woman] Come on, let's get some food.
I fled the tunnels years ago.
translation.it: Ho lasciato i tunnel anni fa.

translation.en: I haven't seen a person since.
Not with flesh on their bones.
it's the last place you'd want to be.
translation.it: quello non è un bel posto.

translation.en: They were going mad with hunger.
Doing terrible things to each other.
I never should have left him.
What I did was listen to you.
translation.it: Non ho fatto altro che darti retta.

translation.en: it's no sin, looking out for yourself.

translation.it: Qui hai quel che ti serve.

translation.en: I know I've done things to make that hard,
but I promise you you're safe here.
translation.it: ma ti giuro che sei al sicuro.

translation.en: And we're in this together now.
I know how to handle Mother.
But we can get my brother.
We'll think clearer with some food in us.
[Daughter] I want to speak to Mother.
[Mother] I'm glad to see you safe, Daughter.

translation.it: E di nuovo a casa tua.

translation.en: You can leave that at the door.
Any action I took against our guest--
You've seen how much of a threat she and her kind can be.
translation.it: Lei e i suoi simili sono una minaccia, lo sai.

translation.en: but you are superior in every way.
translation.it: ma tu sei superiore in ogni aspetto.

translation.en: Because I raised you to be.
I was raised to value human life above all else.
translation.it: Sono stata creata per dare valore alla vita umana.

translation.en: and watch humanity slowly succumb to its self-destructive nature.
translation.it: Non potevo osservare l'umanità soccombere alla sua natura autodistruttiva.

translation.en: More humans will flourish in the new world than ever perished in the old.
translation.it: Nel nuovo mondo, l'umanità prospererà come non poteva nel vecchio.

translation.en: Your whole life, I've taught you to see the bigger picture.
translation.it: Ti ho insegnato a osservare il quadro generale.

translation.en: Or are you prepared to be the woman your family needs?
translation.it: O sei pronta a diventare donna per la tua famiglia?

translation.en: It takes two hands to hold a baby.
translation.it: I bambini si tengono con due mani.
Hai ucciso i tuoi stessi figli.
- Non gli farai del male. - Figlia!

translation.en: Listen to me. I don't want to hurt you.
translation.it: Ascoltami. Non ti farò del male.

translation.en: You will achieve nothing by shooting me, Daughter.
[Mother] This will be difficult for you...
but I'm far more than what you perceive to be your Mother.
translation.it: ma io sono più di quel che consideri tua Madre.

translation.en: This shell is no more my body than those droids outside.
translation.it: Il mio corpo è questa corazza, così come quella dei droidi fuori.

translation.en: Or the machines preparing the Earth for our family.
translation.it: E delle macchine che preparano la Terra per noi.

translation.en: It was I who greeted you at the door, Daughter.
translation.it: Ero io ad aspettarti all'ingresso, Figlia.

translation.en: The failure of your species was inevitable.
translation.it: La tua specie era destinata a fallire.

translation.en: Eventually, I would have been alone.
translation.it: Prima o poi, sarei rimasta da sola.

translation.en: What happens next is up to you.
translation.it: Ora il futuro dipende da te.

translation.en: But I made you into the woman that you are
translation.it: Ma io ti ho reso la donna che sei

translation.en: so that we could do this together. I can take care of them myself.
translation.it: - per fare questo insieme. - Posso accudirli io.

translation.en: That's what you raised me to do, wasn't it?
translation.it: Mi hai cresciuta per farlo, no?

translation.en: someday. Not someday. You've taught me enough.
translation.it: - un giorno. - No. Mi hai istruita a dovere.

translation.en: If you ever need to find me...
[Mother's voice] Did you really think she'd stay here?
That you could replace her mother?
I was never going to hurt her.
translation.it: Non le avrei fatto del male.

translation.en: That you've survived so long where others have not.
translation.it: Che tu sia sopravvissuta più a lungo di altri.

translation.en: As if someone's had a purpose for you.
translation.it: Come ci fosse uno scopo per te.

translation.en: ♪ Rest your head close to my heart ♪
translation.it: Poggia la testa sul mio cuore

translation.en: ♪ Don't you mind what they say ♪
♪ You are so precious to me ♪
